org.vivoweb.ingest.util.repo
Class XMLRecordOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      org.vivoweb.ingest.util.repo.XMLRecordOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable
public class XMLRecordOutputStream
extends OutputStream

An Output Stream that breaks XML blobs into individual Records and writes to a RecordHandler

Author:
Christopher Haines (hainesc@ctrip.ufl.edu)

private boolean compareByteArrays(byte[] arrayOne,
                                  byte[] arrayTwo)
Compare two byte arrays

Parameters:

Returns:
